#include<iostream>
using namespace std;

void spiral(int a[][101],int n,int m)
{
    int i=0,j=0,f1=0,f2=1,flag=0,f5=0;
    int s1=0,e1=m-1,s2=1,e2=n-1,s3=m-1,e3=0,s4=n-2,e4=1;

    int count=n*m;
    while(1)
    {
        if(flag==0)
        {
        if(f1==0)
        {
            for(j=s1;j<=e1;j++)
            {
                cout<<a[s1][j]<<" ";
                   count--;
        if(count==0)
            {
                f5=1;
                break;
            }
            }
            if(f5)
                break;
            s1++;
            e1--;
            f1=1;
        }
        else
        {
            for(i=s2;i<e2;i++)
            {
                cout<<a[i][m-1]<<" ";
                   count--;
        if(count==0)
            {
                f5=1;
                break;
            }
            }
            if(f5)
                break;
            m--;
            s2++;
            e2--;
            f1=0;

        }
        flag=!f1;
        }
        else
        {
            if(f2==1)
        {
            for(j=s3;j>=e3;j--)
            {
                cout<<a[n-1][j]<<" ";
                    count--;
        if(count==0)
            {
                f5=1;
                break;
            }
            }
            if(f5)
                break;
            n--;
            s3--;
            e3++;
            f2=0;
        }
        else
        {
         for(i=s4;i>=e4;i--)
            {
                cout<<a[i][e4-1]<<" ";
                count--;
        if(count==0)
            {
                f5=1;
                break;
            }
            }
            if(f5)
                break;
            s4--;
            e4++;
            f2=1;

        }
        flag=!f2;
        }

    }

}


int main()
{
    int a[101][101];
    int n,m,i,j,t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
    cin>>n;
    cin>>m;
    for(i=0;i<n;i++)
    {
        for(j=0;j<m;j++)
        {
            cin>>a[i][j];
        }
    }
    spiral(a,n,m);
    cout<<"\n";
    }
    
    return 0;
}
